posts.name: Arnaud Langer
posts.cooked:
At the very end of the deployment of the VSS blueprint on DGX Spark, I have the following error while context is being set. Any call to VSS engine results in a similar error.

posts.name: Aniculescu
posts.cooked: Are you using the VSS event reviewer local deployment or the Standard VSS (Hybrid Deployment)

posts.name: Arnaud Langer
posts.cooked: Yes, more specifically I’m following: Local Deployment Single GPU: Deploy Using Docker Compose ARM — Video Search and Summarization Agent

link_counts.title: Deploy Using Docker Compose ARM — Video Search and Summarization Agent

posts.name: Aniculescu
posts.cooked: Please reference our playbook for how to use VSS specifically on Spark: Try NVIDIA NIM APIs

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
